data.name: Legend of Kendor Demo
data.detailed_description:
Legend of Kendor is a Fantasy Free-Roaming Action Roguelike game.

You can explore different biomes and gather powerful items and weapons as one of the four heroes in Kendor. The great wizard's spell protects the fallen heroes until all the lost come back. Because the spell is imbalanced, every time heroes rise, everything will be changed. Level up, enchant your weapon, make alliances, and find powerful items to be strong. Can they save all their loved ones with your help?

Game Features:
20+ items and weapons
10+ Adorable puppies and cats
10+ Killable NPC with own consequences
Monsters with dynamic AI
Many secrets
Dynamic game difficulty
and more hidden secrets
Rebindable key setting
Smooth Pixel graphic with 60 FPS
Sound Effect by Niilo Takalainen
Addictive game music written by ModalModule
Passionate and supportive developer
